news_header: Marian Turski, Holocaust survivor and historian, passed away at 98, advocating against indifference to prevent future atrocities.
news_original_title: Holocaust survivor Marian Turski dies aged 98
news_text: Marian Turski, a Polish Holocaust survivor, historian, and journalist, died at 98. He survived Auschwitz and dedicated his life to educating about the Holocaust. Turski warned against indifference, emphasizing that history could repeat itself. He co-founded a Jewish history museum and was a prominent voice against antisemitism.
